channel.title: I pay you $30 for a link in http://cregox.com/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841
channel.description:
Hi, i would like to know if is possible to pay you $30 so you can add a link to a bitcoin site from the following page:
/talk/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841
Can i send you sample of the text link that i want to add?
Thank you for your time.

item.title: I pay you $30 for a link in http://cregox.com/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

side question: is Ioannis M Giagkou your friend? got a similar question there some weeks ago, must not be a coincidence.

anyway, I'm not really interested in selling any kind of conventional ads, thanks.

if you'd like to talk more about doing something really different, or just let me know why you would even offer this to me, I'm sure up to a conversation!

wish you best.

Read full topic
item.source: I pay you $30 for a link in http://cregox.com/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841

item.title: I pay you $30 for a link in http://cregox.com/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841
item.dc:creator: @John_Flex John Flex
item.description:
@John_Flex wrote:

Hi, i would like to know if is possible to pay you $30 so you can add a link to a bitcoin site from the following page:

[CNAi 2w] the bitcoin future is determined! (2016 feb 05) tech
CNAi 2w stands for "codenewbie artificial intelligence biweekly", but that might change soon... when I join in around minute 11 everything slows down for a while, I was already sleepy and trying to figure out why it was so slow, and it was obviously thanks to my terrible non-fiber 0.5 mbps upstream internet here at historical lisbon center. I promise the broadcast gets better later on, if you enjoy artificial intelligence, science and / or philosophy. topics touched: autonomous cars andâ€¦

Can i send you sample of the text link that i want to add?

Thank you for your time.

Read full topic
